sentences.english: Today we're going to learn an English anthem.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我們要學一首兒歌。

sentences.english: Which is sort of a childhood nursery rhyme. And then they cut to this pig and a car with two pin wheels,
sentences.chinese: 這是小時候的兒歌。然後鏡頭切換到豬和有風車的車，

sentences.english: At last, let's learn to say a rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 現在就讓我們來學一首兒歌。

sentences.english: Today, our KB students will have a bilingual rhymes contest. Now please enjoy our wonderful rhymes.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們中班小朋友將舉行一場雙語兒歌擂臺賽。

sentences.english: One of the best anime songs…
sentences.chinese: 八字年代的兒歌，是大人都啱聽的。

sentences.english: Read and memorize the text on p45 and the rhyme on p50 (textbook).
sentences.chinese: 熟讀並背誦第45頁上的課文和第50頁的兒歌。

sentences.english: The author also pondered over children dance dramas composed by Li Jinhui from the aspect of "aesthetic education".
sentences.chinese: 並對黎錦暉的兒歌舞劇，重新予以“美育”觀照。

sentences.english: There are several versions of this song's orgin .
sentences.chinese: 關於這首兒歌的起源，有幾種不同的版本。

sentences.english: Talk about lack of, give me singing children's songs, back to my thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 講乏了，給我唱兒歌，拉回了我的思緒。

sentences.english: It almost sounds like this device is humming a favorite children's tune.
sentences.chinese: 聽起來似乎這樣的裝置像是哼著受歡迎的兒歌。

sentences.english: Want to read “Humpty Dumpty” to your newborn?
sentences.chinese: 想給你的新生兒讀讀兒歌“小矮胖子”？

sentences.english: Child, do you remember the first baby song which we practiced for hundreds of times?
sentences.chinese: 孩子，你忘了我們練習幾百回才學會的第一首兒歌嗎？

sentences.english: Scores are provided. Teachers can play the piano and sing the songs with the children.
sentences.chinese: 附兒歌曲譜，方便教師自行彈奏，與幼兒一起唱詠。

sentences.english: Remember that nursery rhyme about what little girls and little boys are made of?
sentences.chinese: 還記得兒歌裏面是怎麼唱的嗎？

definition: answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
to eject/to exit from/to pop up
